tourBios.otherVics: (2): 2004 Casino de Charlevoix Cup [with Stephen Woodard]. 2006 Bloomingdale Open.
tourBios.carHigh: 2007: Best finish was 22nd at the TELUS Edmonton Open where he shot second round 64. 2006: Won the Bloomingdale Open. 2004: Won the Casino de Carlevoix Cup with playing partner, Stephen Woodard.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Earned All Big-Ten Conference honours in 1996 while at Penn State...Selected as the 1995-96 Mid-Atlantic Region Player of the Year...Was the Big Ten Conference Freshman of the Year in 1992-93...Won the 1995 New York State Amateur
tourBios.otherInfo: Has not played PGA TOUR Canada since 2007. Has played on the New England, Australasian, U.S. Pro and Moonlight Tours.
